person.persName: Friedrich Bertsch (Cincinnati, Ohio, lithographer and lieutenant (U.S.A.) )

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, lithographer and soldier. Native of Germany. Married Margaret Bertsch. Father of Max Bertsch and Helena Bertsch. Lithographer in Cincinnati, Ohio in 1860. Served in the Ninth Ohio Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant and first lieutenant from May 27, 1861 until June 7, 1864.
